item.title: ChatGPT for Real Estate: Can't live with it. Can't live without it.
item.description: Focus on real estate and finance OpenAI’s ChatGPT requires no introduction. A surge of activity has occurred in technical forums, mainstream news sites, and social media platforms. Rather than repeating the broad capabilities of ChatGPT, let’s take a closer look at how AI tools such as ChatGPT may be utilized for Real Estate Analytics, Mortgages, and helping Real Estate Agents. Why real estate and finance? These are huge industries that impact the daily lives of just about everyone and often require a personal touch.
